summary.span: 为使用托管代码的编译器编写器提供功能，编译器编写器使用托管代码在影响公共语言运行时的运行时行为的元数据中指定特性。

span.span: Provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间主要用于编译器编写器，不过，它的多个类（例如 ）在各种应用程序中使用。This namespace is primarily for compiler writers, although several of its classes, such as , are used in a wide variety of applications.
